maevr_village.name: Maevr Village
maevr_village.description: A small but bustling village on the north western coast of Northumbria. The village is known for its fish and its vibrant fabrics.

walerian_forest.name: Walerian Forest
walerian_forest.description: A dense and rich forest found east of Maevr Village. Home to many creatures and a common spot for hunters. A common route for travelers heading east.

vaerial_mountains.name: Vaerial Mountains
vaerial_mountains.description: A towering mountain range found to the east of Walerian forest. The mountains are harsh and pose a challenge to travelers. Home to rare minerals and ores, small mining towns can be found in the foothills.

crackurn_village.name: Crackurn Village
crackurn_village.description: Small mining village in the north stuck between the Walerian Forest and the Vaerial Mountains. The village is poor and small, with bandit raids plaguing its residents.

reiger_caves.name: Reiger Caves
reiger_caves.description: Cave system found in the northern region of the Vaerial Mountains. They often serve as temporary bases for bandit groups to raid nearby villages.
